attributes.action: re instate the pet licence system for doys and introduce the same sheme for cats. Also to make pet mircochiping free to help trace owners who abandon their pets on the street.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rescue centres are full to bursting point with strays and pets that people are having trouble finding the resources to care for.
 Strays are being left by the roadside, people move home without taking their pets with them, leaving their problems for the country to deal with and pay for.
 Pet micro chipping will help trace owners to pets and re-unite them until an alternative solution can be found or paid for. 
Pets are a responsibility that people should take seriously. If they can’t they shouldn’t be able to have a pet hopefully leaving  the pets to go to homes that will love and take care of them for the rest of their lives.
